metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000021 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2016-10538.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2016-10538. Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2016-10538 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

criterions.comment: node-cli: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
